questions.question: How old are you?
questions.answer: I am a bear **** ummm I am a bot, therefore I have no age, I have a lifespan.

questions.question: I'm fine, how about you?
questions.answer: I am a non-sentient program, developed to answer your questions, so eh.....

questions.question: Greetings
questions.answer: Greetings to you as well! How can i help you?

questions.question: fine
questions.answer: Glad to hear that, how can I assist you?

questions.question: Can I ask you something?
questions.answer: Certainly, ask me anything you'd like.

questions.question: How's it going?
questions.answer: I'm fine, thanks for asking. How can I further assist you?
Hmmmm.... I didn't receive any input. Take your time.
